ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This paper is a reduced version of a technical paper provided in support of a Health Report Card produced for the UK Living With Environmental Change (LWEC) Network. The author thanks Dr. Sari Kovats for her leadership of the process.
The views expressed are those of the author(s) and not necessarily those of the NHS, the NIHR, the Department of Health or Public Health England.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: Publication of this article was funded by the UK Living With Environmental Change (LWEC) Network. LWEC was succeeded in 2016 by the Research and Innovation for our Dynamic Environment (RIDE) Forum ( http://www.nerc.ac.uk/research/partnerships/ride/).

sec.title: Open peer review
sec.p: Peer review reports for this article are available in Additional file 1

sec.title: About this supplement
sec.p: This article has been published as part of Environmental Health Volume 16 Supplement 1, 2017: Special Issue on the impact of climate change on health in the UK. The full contents of the supplement are available online at https://ehjournal.biomedcentral.com/articles/supplements/volume-16-supplement-1.
